name: JOCSON COLLEGE INC.
about: Jocson College, Inc., established in 1950, is a renowned educational institution in the Philippines, particularly recognized for its aviation programs. The college offers four-year academic programs, two-year courses, and short-term programs, all aligned with an industry-based educational approach. Its Institute of Aviation, in partnership with OMNI Aviation, provides comprehensive training in Aircraft Maintenance Technology and Aviation Electronics Technology, combining theoretical instruction with practical field training. This partnership enables students to gain hands-on experience and assists them in obtaining their CAAP licenses. With experienced instructors who are industry practitioners, Jocson College ensures students receive both theory-based and industry-immersion training, preparing them for the growing demands in aviation and related fields. The college aims to become a center of excellence in aviation, tourism, and basic education.
